org.mini2Dx.core.controller

Class XboxOneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.XboxOneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, MdxController<XboxOneControllerListener>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinuxXboxOneController, MacXboxOneController, WindowsXboxOneController

    public abstract class XboxOneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MdxController<XboxOneControllerListener>
    Base class for Xbox One controller implementations
